mapper.update: update photo_user set pw = #{pw}, name = #{name}, email = #{email}, tel = #{tel} where num = #{num}
mapper.insert: insert into photo_user(id, pw, name, email, tel) values(#{id}, password(#{pw}), #{name}, #{email}, #{tel})
mapper.select: select * from photo_user where id = #{id} and pw = password(#{pw})
select id from photo_user where id = #{id}
